And on this holy day of the year one thousand-six hundred eighty-fourth of the year of the holy martyrs+ began the apparition of the Saint, the Mother of Light, the Virgin Mary, Mother of the God atop the domes of the church that is consecrated in her pure name in the vicinity of Zeitoun in the suburbs of Cairo, during the patriarchate of his holiness, the great Pope Abba Cyril the Sixth, the 116th patriarch. Her apparition was accompanied with many miracles, wonders and healings. May the blessing of her intercessions be with us, Amen.
